title: "China develops Mongolian-speaking AI anchor"
excerpt: "HOHHOT -- A Mongolian-speaking artificial intelligence anchor has been developed in North China's Inner Mongolia autonomous region. The AI anchor, which looks extremely similar to a human anchor, integrates multiple technologies including speech synthesis of the Mongolian language and machine translation,"
